issue.title: [Java] Check if ArrowBuf is empty buffer in getActualConsumedMemory() and getPossibleConsumedMemory()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-791](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-791). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Most of the methods related to memory accounting in ArrowBuf have special handling for the case when then Buffer is the empty buffer instance. This check is missing in these two methods.
